card.name: Academy at Tolaria West
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, draw seven cards. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, discard your hand.

card.name: Agyrem
card.text: Whenever a white creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever a nonwhite creature dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures can't attack you until a player planeswalks.

card.name: Bant
card.text: All creatures have exalted. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a divinity counter on target green, white, or blue creature. That creature has indestructible for as long as it has a divinity counter on it.

card.name: Cliffside Market
card.text: When you planeswalk to Cliffside Market or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange life totals with target player. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, exchange control of two target permanents that share a card type.

card.name: Eloren Wilds
card.text: Whenever a player taps a permanent for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that permanent produced. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target player can't cast spells until a player planeswalks.

card.name: Feeding Grounds
card.text: Red spells cost {1} less to cast. Green spells cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Fields of Summer
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may gain 2 life. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may gain 10 life.

card.name: Glimmervoid Basin
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell with a single target, he or she copies that spell for each other spell, permanent, card not on the battlefield, and/or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of them. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, choose target creature. Each player except that creature's controller puts a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield.

card.name: Goldmeadow
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, that land's controller puts three 0/1 white Goat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a 0/1 white Goat creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Grixis
card.text: Blue, black, and/or red creature cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to the card's mana cost. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Immersturm
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Isle of Vesuva
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller puts a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, destroy target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.

card.name: Izzet Steam Maze
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it. The player may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost {3} less to cast.

card.name: Krosa
card.text: All creatures get +2/+2. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Lethe Lake
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Llanowar
card.text: All creatures have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool." Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Minamo
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may draw a card. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each player may return a blue card from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

card.name: Murasa
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target land becomes a 4/4 creature that's still a land.

card.name: Naar Isle
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a flame counter on Naar Isle, then Naar Isle deals damage to you equal to the number of flame counters on it. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, Naar Isle deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Naya
card.text: You may play any number of additional lands on each of your turns. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target red, green, or white creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.

card.name: Otaria
card.text: Instant and sorcery cards in graveyards have flashback. The flashback cost is equal to the card's mana cost. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Panopticon
card.text: When you planeswalk to Panopticon, draw a card. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, draw a card.

card.name: Pools of Becoming
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top three cards of your planar deck. Each of the revealed cards' {CHAOS} abilities triggers. Then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

card.name: Raven's Run
card.text: All creatures have wither. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

card.name: Sanctum of Serra
card.text: When you planeswalk away from Sanctum of Serra, destroy all nonland permanents. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may have your life total become 20.

card.name: Sea of Sand
card.text: Players reveal each card they draw. Whenever a player draws a land card, that player gains 3 life. Whenever a player draws a nonland card, that player loses 3 life. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Shiv
card.text: All creatures have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Skybreen
card.text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. Spells that share a card type with the top card of a library can't be cast. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target player loses life equal to the number of cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Sokenzan
card.text: All creatures get +1/+1 and have haste. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Stronghold Furnace
card.text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, Stronghold Furnace deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Tazeem
card.text: Creatures can't block. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, draw a card for each land you control.

card.name: The AEther Flues
card.text: When you planeswalk to The AEther Flues or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Dark Barony
card.text: Whenever a nonblack card is put into a player's graveyard from anywhere, that player loses 1 life. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: The Eon Fog
card.text: Players skip their untap steps. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, untap all permanents you control.

card.name: The Fourth Sphere
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a nonblack creature. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Great Forest
card.text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures you control get +0/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: The Hippodrome
card.text: All creatures get -5/-0. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may destroy target creature if its power is 0 or less.

card.name: The Maelstrom
card.text: When you planeswalk to The Maelstrom or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you revealed a card but didn't put it onto the battlefield, put it on the bottom of your library. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Turri Island
card.text: Creature spells cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Undercity Reaches
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

card.name: Velis Vel
card.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Akoum
card.text: Players may cast enchantment cards as though they had flash. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, destroy target creature that isn't enchanted.

card.name: Aretopolis
card.text: When you planeswalk to Aretopolis or at the beginning of your upkeep, put a scroll counter on Aretopolis, then you gain life equal to the number of scroll counters on it. When Aretopolis has ten or more scroll counters on it, planeswalk. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a scroll counter on Aretopolis, then draw cards equal to the number of scroll counters on it.

card.name: Astral Arena
card.text: No more than one creature can attack each combat. No more than one creature can block each combat. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, Astral Arena deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Bloodhill Bastion
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, it gains double strike and haste until end of turn. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, exile target nontoken creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Chaotic AEther
card.text: When you encounter Chaotic AEther, each blank roll of the planar die is a {CHAOS} roll until a player planeswalks away from a plane.

card.name: Edge of Malacol
card.text: If a creature you control would untap during your untap step, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, untap each creature you control.

card.name: Furnace Layer
card.text: When you planeswalk to Furnace Layer or at the beginning of your upkeep, select target player at random. That player discards a card. If that player discards a land card this way, he or she loses 3 life. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Gavony
card.text: All creatures have vigilance. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Glen Elendra
card.text: At end of combat, you may exchange control of target creature you control that dealt combat damage to a player this combat and target creature that player controls. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, gain control of target creature you own.

card.name: Grand Ossuary
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, its controller distributes a number of +1/+1 counters equal to its power among any number of target creatures he or she controls. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each player exiles all creatures he or she controls and puts X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the total power of the creatures he or she exiled this way. Then planeswalk.

card.name: Grove of the Dreampods
card.text: When you planeswalk to Grove of the Dreampods or at the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Hedron Fields of Agadeem
card.text: Creatures with power 7 or greater can't attack or block. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature token with annihilator 1 onto the battlefield.

card.name: Interplanar Tunnel
card.text: When you encounter Interplanar Tunnel, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal five plane cards. Put a plane card from among them on top of your planar deck, then put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom in a random order.

card.name: Jund
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black, red, or green creature spell, it gains devour 5. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Kessig
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by non-Werewolf creatures. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each creature you control gets +2/+2, gains trample, and becomes a Werewolf in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Kharasha Foothills
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks a player, for each other opponent, you may put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. If you do, Kharasha Foothills deals that much damage to target creature.

card.name: Kilnspire District
card.text: When you planeswalk to Kilnspire District or at the beginning of your precombat main phase, put a charge counter on Kilnspire District, then add {R} to your mana pool for each charge counter on it. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may pay {X}. If you do, Kilnspire District deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Lair of the Ashen Idol
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, planeswalk. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, any number of target players each put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Morphic Tide
card.text: When you encounter Morphic Tide, each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, land, and planeswalker cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Mount Keralia
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a pressure counter on Mount Keralia. When you planeswalk away from Mount Keralia, it deals damage equal to the number of pressure counters on it to each creature and each planeswalker. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, prevent all damage that planes named Mount Keralia would deal this game to permanents you control.

card.name: Mutual Epiphany
card.text: When you encounter Mutual Epiphany, each player draws four cards.

card.name: Nephalia
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard. Then return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Norn's Dominion
card.text: When you planeswalk away from Norn's Dominion, destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may put a fate counter on target permanent.

card.name: Onakke Catacomb
card.text: All creatures are black and have deathtouch. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Orochi Colony
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Orzhova
card.text: When you planeswalk away from Orzhova, each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard.

card.name: Planewide Disaster
card.text: When you encounter Planewide Disaster, destroy all creatures.

card.name: Prahv
card.text: If you cast a spell this turn, you can't attack with creatures. If you attacked with creatures this turn, you can't cast spells. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Quicksilver Sea
card.text: When you planeswalk to Quicksilver Sea or at the beginning of your upkeep, scry 4. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top card of your library. You may play it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Reality Shaping
card.text: When you encounter Reality Shaping, starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Selesnya Loft Gardens
card.text: If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead. If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: Spatial Merging
card.text: When you encounter Spatial Merging, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.

card.name: Stairs to Infinity
card.text: Players have no maximum hand size. Whenever you roll the planar die, draw a card. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top card of your planar deck. You may put it on the bottom of your planar deck.

card.name: Stensia
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to one or more players for the first time in a turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each creature you control gains "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player" until end of turn.

card.name: Takenuma
card.text: Whenever a creature leaves the battlefield, its controller draws a card. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Talon Gates
card.text: Any time you could cast a sorcery, you may exile a nonland card from your hand with X time counters on it, where X is its converted mana cost. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, remove two time counters from each suspended card you own.

card.name: The Zephyr Maze
card.text: Creatures with flying get +2/+0. Creatures without flying get -2/-0. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Time Distortion
card.text: When you encounter Time Distortion, reverse the game's turn order.

card.name: Trail of the Mage-Rings
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells have rebound. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Truga Jungle
card.text: All lands have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Windriddle Palaces
card.text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. You may play the top card of any player's library. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Celestine Reef
card.text: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Horizon Boughs
card.text: All permanents untap during each player's untap step. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mirrored Depths
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, target player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tember City
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Tember City deals 1 damage to that player. Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

card.name: A Display of My Dark Power
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: All in Good Time
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Schemes can't be set in motion that turn.

card.name: All Shall Smolder in My Wake
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target nonbasic land.

card.name: Approach My Molten Realm
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, if a source would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Behold the Power of Destruction
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.

card.name: Choose Your Champion
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a player. Until your next turn, only you and the chosen player can cast spells and attack with creatures.

card.name: Dance, Pathetic Marionette
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

card.name: Embrace My Diabolical Vision
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.

card.name: Every Hope Shall Vanish
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a nonland card from each of those hands. Those players discard those cards.

card.name: Every Last Vestige Shall Rot
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, put each nonland permanent target player controls with converted mana cost X or less on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Evil Comes to Fruition
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, put seven 0/1 green Plant creature tokens onto the battlefield. If you control ten or more lands, put seven 3/3 green Elemental creature tokens onto the battlefield instead.

card.name: Feed the Machine
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two creatures. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a creature.

card.name: I Bask in Your Silent Awe
card.text: Each opponent can't cast more than one spell each turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if no opponent cast a spell since your last turn ended, abandon this scheme.

card.name: I Call on the Ancient Magics
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches his or her library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into his or her hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: I Delight in Your Convulsions
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: I Know All, I See All
card.text: Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard this turn from anywhere, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Ignite the Cloneforge!
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Into the Earthen Maw
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

card.name: Introductions Are in Order
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, choose one - Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library; or you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Know Naught but Fire
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Look Skyward and Despair
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: May Civilization Collapse
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she sacrifices two lands. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a land.

card.name: Mortal Flesh Is Weak
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent's life total becomes the lowest life total among your opponents.

card.name: My Crushing Masterstroke
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of all nonland permanents your opponents control until end of turn. Untap those permanents. They gain haste until end of turn. Each of them attacks its owner this turn if able.

card.name: My Genius Knows No Bounds
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

card.name: My Undead Horde Awakens
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When a creature put onto the battlefield with this scheme dies, abandon this scheme.

card.name: My Wish Is Your Command
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a noncreature, nonland card revealed this way and cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Nature Demands an Offering
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Nature Shields Its Own
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked, if you're the defending player, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield blocking that creature. When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

card.name: Nothing Can Stop Me Now
card.text: If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. At the beginning of each end step, if you've been dealt 5 or more damage this turn, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Then each opponent who didn't sacrifice a creature discards two cards.

card.name: Realms Befitting My Majesty
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Roots of All Evil
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, put five 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Rotted Ones, Lay Siege
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield that attacks that player each combat if able.

card.name: Surrender Your Thoughts
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, he or she discards four cards. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents discards two cards.

card.name: The Dead Shall Serve
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each of those creatures attacks its owner each combat if able.

card.name: The Fate of the Flammable
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, this scheme deals 6 damage to him or her. If the player chooses others, this scheme deals 3 damage to each of your other opponents.

card.name: The Iron Guardian Stirs
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, put a 4/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Pieces Are Coming Together
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: The Very Soil Shall Shake
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. When a creature you control dies, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Tooth, Claw, and Tail
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to three target nonland permanents.

card.name: Which of You Burns Brightest?
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, this scheme deals X damage to target opponent and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.

card.name: Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, draw four cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

card.name: Your Will Is Not Your Own
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Drench the Soil in Their Blood
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Imprison This Insolent Wretch
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during that player's untap step. When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Plots That Span Centuries
card.text: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time ou would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

card.name: Your Inescapable Doom
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for higher life total, you choose one.

card.name: The Protector
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: The Philosopher
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: The Avenger
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: The Warrior
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: The Hunter
card.text: {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: The Harvester
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: The Slayer
card.text: You start the game with an additional 7 life.

card.name: The General
card.text: Exile The General: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.

card.name: The Savant
card.text: Exile The Savant: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

card.name: The Tyrant
card.text: Exile The Tyrant: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: The Warmonger
card.text: Exile The Warmonger: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: The Provider
card.text: Exile The Provider: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: The Explorer
card.text: You may play an additional land during each of your turns.

card.name: The Vanquisher
card.text: Your starting hand size is increased by one. Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

card.name: Spear of the General
Cloak of the Philosopher
Lash of the Tyrant
Axe of the Warmonger
Bow of the Hunter
The Destined
card.text: Spells you cast that target a creature you control cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: The Champion
card.text: {2}, {T}, Exile The Champion: Search your library for a legendary artifact card that isn't a creature, reveal it, and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Hydra Head
card.text: Hero's Reward - When Hydra Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life.

card.name: Ravenous Brute Head
card.text: Hero's Reward - When Ravenous Brute Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life and draws a card.

card.name: Savage Vigor Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Savage Vigor Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Shrieking Titan Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, each player discards a card. Hero's Reward - When Shrieking Titan Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Snapping Fang Head
card.text: At the beginning of the Hydra's end step, Snapping Fang Head deals 1 damage to each player. Hero's Reward - When Snapping Fang Head leaves the battlefield, each player gains 4 life and draws a card.

card.name: Disorienting Glower
card.text: Players can't cast spells until the Hydra's next turn.

card.name: Distract the Hydra
card.text: Each player may sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way chooses a Head and taps it. Each player who didn't sacrifice a creature loses 3 life.

card.name: Grown from the Stump
card.text: Put exactly two cards named Hydra Head onto the battlefield from the Hydra's graveyard. If you can't, reveal cards from the top of the Hydra's library until you reveal a Head card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into the Hydra's graveyard.

card.name: Hydra's Impenetrable Hide
card.text: Each Head gains indestructible until the end of the Hydra's next turn.

card.name: Neck Tangle
card.text: If there are five or more Heads on the battlefield, tap two of them and they don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Otherwise, reveal the top card of the Hydra's library and the Hydra casts that card.

card.name: Noxious Hydra Breath
card.text: Choose one - Noxious Hydra Breath deals 5 damage to each player, or destroy each tapped non-Head creature.

card.name: Strike the Weak Spot
card.text: Destroy target Head. If that Head was elite, the Hydra takes an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Swallow the Hero Whole
card.text: Each player exiles a creature he or she controls. Until the Hydra's next turn, when a Head leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Torn Between Heads
card.text: Tap up to two Heads. They don't untap during the Hydra's next untap step. Torn Between Heads deals 5 damage to each player.

card.name: Unified Lunge
card.text: Unified Lunge deals X damage to each player, where X is the number of Heads on the battlefield.

card.name: Minotaur Goreseeker
card.text: Haste Minotaur Goreseeker attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Minotaur Younghorn
card.text: Haste Minotaur Younghorn attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Mogis's Chosen
card.text: Mogis's Chosen enters the battlefield tapped. Mogis's Chosen attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Phoberos Reaver
card.text: Haste Phoberos Reaver attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Reckless Minotaur
card.text: Haste Reckless Minotaur attacks each turn if able. At the beginning of the end step, destroy Reckless Minotaur.

card.name: Consuming Rage
card.text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Descend on the Prey
card.text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains first strike until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Intervention of Keranos
card.text: At the beginning of combat this turn, Intervention of Keranos deals 3 damage to each creature.

card.name: Touch of the Horned God
card.text: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Unquenchable Fury
card.text: Each Minotaur can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Altar of Mogis
card.text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Altar of Mogis is put into a graveyard from anywhere, the Horde sacrifices two Minotaurs.

card.name: Massacre Totem
card.text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Massacre Totem is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put the top seven cards of the Horde's library into its graveyard.

card.name: Plundered Statue
card.text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Plundered Statue is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each palyer draws a card.

card.name: Refreshing Elixir
card.text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Refreshing Elixir is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player gains 5 life.

card.name: Vitality Salve
card.text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward - When Vitality Salve is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player returns a creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Xenagos Ascended
card.text: Xenagos Ascended can't leave the battlefield as long as a Reveler is on the battlefield. When Xenagos Ascended leaves the battlefield, each player wins the game.

card.name: Ecstatic Piper
card.text: When Ecstatic Piper enters the battlefield, Xenagos Ascended attacks this turn if able. Hero's Reward - When Ecstatic Piper leaves the battlefield, each player gains 2 life.

card.name: Maddened Oread
card.text: As long as five or more Revelers are on the battlefield, Maddened Oread attacks each turn if able. Hero's Reward - When Maddened Oread leaves the battlefield, each player gains 3 life.

card.name: Pheres-Band Revelers
card.text: Hero's Reward - When Pheres-Band Revelers leaves the battlefield, each player draws a card.

card.name: Rollicking Throng
card.text: When Rollicking Throng enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of Xenagos's library and Xenagos casts that card. (This ability doesn't trigger as the game begins.)

card.name: Serpent Dancers
card.text: Deathtouch Hero's Reward - When Serpent Dancers leaves the battlefield, each player draws a card.

card.name: Wild Maenads
card.text: First strike Hero's Reward - When Wild Maenads leaves the battlefield, each player gains 3 life.

card.name: Impulsive Charge
card.text: At the beginning of combat this turn, all Revelers gain haste until end of turn and attack this combat if able.

card.name: Impulsive Destruction
card.text: Each player may sacrifice an artifact or enchantment. Impulsive Destruction deals 3 damage to each player who didn't sacrifice a permanent this way.

card.name: Impulsive Return
card.text: Return two cards named Ecstatic Piper from Xenagos's graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of combat this turn, Impulsive Return deals damage to each player equal to the number of Revelers on the battlefield.

card.name: Rip to Pieces
card.text: At the beginning of combat this turn, each Reveler deals 1 damage to each player and each creature those players control.

card.name: Xenagos's Scorn
card.text: Xenagos Ascended gains trample until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Xenagos's Strike
card.text: Xenagos's Strike deals 4 damage to each player.

card.name: Dance of Flame
card.text: Whenever a Reveler attacks, Dance of Flame deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Dance of Panic
card.text: As long as five or more Revelers are on the battlefield, all Revelers have haste and attack each turn if able.

card.name: Godslayer Stickers
card.text: {orange}Use this card to select an extra ability for your Hero Equipment.{reset} Option 1 - Equipped creature has double strike. Option 2 - Whenever equipped creature deals damage, untap two target lands. Option 3 - Equipped creature has vigilance and can block an additional creature each combat. Option 4 - Whenever equipped creature deals damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Option 5 - Whenever equipped creature deals damage, scry 1. Option 6 - Equipped creature has protection from enchantments. Option 7 - Whenever equipped creature deals damage, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Morph
card.text: You can cover a face-down creature with this reminder card. A card with morph can be turned face up any time for its morph cost.

card.name: Manifest
card.text: You can cover a face-down manifested creature with this reminder card. A manifested creature card can be turned face up any time for its mana cost. A face down card can also be turned face up for its morph cost.
